value:
$WmMPID_フード,ch00_29_Hood_N_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$Nu!$k$pWhat a relief. We've all been looking
everywhere for you!$k$p$EFace_Pain|Wait! You're not—$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|Oh? Looking for me, were you?
Hm. Of course you were.$k$pI am Plumeria, the dökkálfar of
lewd dreams.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Careful, everyone!$k$pYou! Dökkálfar! Stop forcing terrible
dreams on these people! Free them
to return to their waking lives!$k$p$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|Sorry, but it's too late for that. They
are already too deep in my dream...
Enthralled by it. Crushed under it.$k$pAnd soon, you all will be as well.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_Normal,Face|Filthy mortals... I suppose I'll have
to bring Triandra along with me
next time...$k$pGood luck keeping up when the two
of us come together.$k$pBe seeing you.$k$p$WmMPID_フード,ch00_29_Hood_N_Normal,Face|...$k$p

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It's just as Alfonse said. No mistake!
That was $Nu...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|It is still unclear on what exactly
is happening... But this keeps
getting stranger and stranger.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|If only we knew where we could find
you, $Nu...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|It seems likely the dökkálfar are
behind this, whatever the case.$k$pSo many people have been trapped
in those wicked nightmares... I hope
$Nu's all right...$k$pBut we don't need to worry! As long
as we do as King Freyr instructed,
everything will be fine!$k$pWe just need to shoo those dökkálfar
out of Ljósálfheimr, and then blow
the horn! And THEN—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|And then we will all awaken in our
world, together. And with us, we'll
have $Nu!$k$pHang on just a little while longer,
$Nu...$k$p$Sbs150|
